plot: Paranoid country boy Pete is looking forward to moving to the big city - until all his friends start telling him about how dangerous it really is there.
title: The Wallet
plot_es: Paranoid country boy Pete is looking forward to moving to the big city - until all his friends start telling him about how dangerous it really is there.
plot_en: Paranoid country boy Pete is looking forward to moving to the big city - until all his friends start telling him about how dangerous it really is there.
